segments.text: There are some things I miss . But I love Chinese food.And I think the people in Taiwan are really hospitable.Besides , I grew up in Los Angeles , so I'm used to living in crowded places.Why are you going to America ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to New York to visit my sister . She is in art school . I've never been to New York before . I'm kind of scared .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I know a lot of people have guns there . I think maybe it isn't too safe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry about it.Your sister lives there . She probably knows the places in town you shouldn't go.It ' s true there are some dangerous places in big American cities.But if your sister lives there , she must know the city pretty well already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm not really scared . Maybe only a little .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't believe what you see on TV . You will have a good time in New York.What things do you want to see ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to see the museums , and I want to shop a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The museums are excellent . And the shopping ! Well ! I'm sure you'll spend a lot of money there .
segments.speaker: S1
